ratings.comment: Steffen is hilarious, his class is straightforward and an easy A. The tests are reading heavy and lecture heavy, but everything is there for you and there are no surprises. Readings are helpful but not mandatory for success. Take advantage of extra credit if you need it. Run a first draft of papers through TA to get a good grade.

Professor Silvis keeps class entertaining and never fails to make you laugh. He is intelligent and knowledgeable about Theatre. The DIS portion is worth 65% of your grade, and LEC is based on two exams. A lot of extra credit opportunities and make sure to read the plays for the tests.
Super fun professor, keeps lecture interesting. Homework is reading a play each week, writing 3 papers and going to plays. Lots of extra credit opportunities.
